section Section1;
shared Manufacturing_Expense_Budget = let
  Source = Sql.Database("SGSINSSQLDEV1", "SPG_Database_Test"),
  Navigation = Source{[Schema = "XXFACTS", Item = "FFDU_FIN_MfgExpenseBudget"]}[Data],
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Navigation, each [GL_ENTITY_CODE] = Entity),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Filtered rows", {{"FC_YEAR", "FC Year"}, {"BUDGET_AMOUNT_USD", "Budget Amount USD"}, {"GL_DEPARTMENT_CODE", "GL Department Code"}, {"GL_ENTITY_CODE", "GL Entity Code"}, {"GL_ACCOUNT_CODE", "GL Account Code"}}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Renamed columns", {{"Budget Amount USD", Currency.Type}}),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Changed column type", {"FC Year", "GL Department Code", "GL Entity Code", "GL Account Code", "Budget Amount USD", "FC_QUARTER"}),
  #"Renamed columns 1" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed other columns", {{"FC_QUARTER", "FC Quarter"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns 1";
shared Entity = let
  Entity = "845" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  Entity;
shared ORG = let
  ORG = "PPG" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  ORG;
